title: Upload your file of documents
p1: Once you’ve read the orders from the tribunal, make sure:
bullet1: you have the set of documents in one PDF file
bullet2: that if an index is requested, the items are in date order or an order in which the tribunal have requested
bullet3: the index item refers to the correct page in the document
bullet4: you only include relevant documents and material for your case
bullet5: the PDF document falls within any page limits given by the tribunal
p2: If you’re referencing one section of a document like a contract of employment, say which part in the index.
p3: If you need to refer to previous case documents, go to your case documents (opens in new tab)

fileUpload.linkText: Or upload your summary as a separate document (optional)
fileUpload.hint:
You can only upload 1 document.

If you want to upload an email, download and convert from your email client first. Most email clients will give the option of downloading as pdf or PostScript.

Upload a file
fileUpload.hintExisting:
You can only upload 1 document.

If you want to upload an email, download and convert from your email client first. Most email clients will give the option of downloading as pdf or PostScript.

You have previously uploaded: {{filename}}

acceptedFormats.label: Accepted formats
acceptedFormats.p1: Accepted file formats are pdf, doc, docx, txt, dot, jpg, jpeg, bmp, tif, tiff, png, xls, xlt, xla, xlsx, xltx, xlsb, ppt, pot, pps, ppa, pptx, potx, ppsx, rtf, csv.

hearingDocumentFileName.invalidFileFormat: The type of file you are trying to upload is not supported by our system. Please convert it into a common supported file type for example word, excel, pdf.
hearingDocumentFileName.invalidFileName: The name of the file provided is invalid. A file name cannot exceed 150 characters or contain any of the following characters: \/:*?"|<>
hearingDocumentFileName.invalidFileSize: The file you are trying to upload has exceeded the maximum file size limit, please reduce the size of the file.
hearingDocumentFileName.backEndError: There was an error uploading your file. Please try again. If this error persists please contact support.
